name: Retrola k ase in Miracle World
summary:
Blue skies have returned!

Retrola k ase in Miracle World is an epic retro style platforming adventure, in which players have to guide a burger loving Llama in his quest to defeat the an Hotdog Alien and recover the world's stolen hamburgers... before they get cold!

Explore 10 fantasy worlds with 60 original stages plagued with hazards, pits and the strangest and coolest enemies you've ever seen. Fight epic boss battles against alien Hotdogs, with the only help of your bare hands and reflexes!

Use amazing powerups to drive, skate, get through a volcano in fire and even fly through the clouds! Think you can get to the end of the adventure? It's not that easy!

Featuring a crazy storyline with tons of characters and references, a complete original chiptune soundtrack and gorgeous pixel art graphics running at 60fps!

Pure, simple and classic gaming fun!
